name: Platform of European Memory and Conscience
goal: Research, education, awareness raising and justice in the field of coming to terms with the legacy of 20th century totalitarianism in Europe.
interests: Communication, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: International competition for architects and artists to create a proposal of a memorial for the victims of totalitarianism, to be offered to the City and the Region of Brussels as the "capital of Europe"
